Container.Name: plutonium-t5mp
Container.Overview: Runs a Plutonium Black Ops Dedicated Multiplayer Server.

Config.Name: Game Port
Config.Description: Maps the port used by the server for game communication to the host.

Config.Name: Plutonium Path
Config.Description: The location where the Plutonium files are installed. You can reuse the same location for multiple servers (and multiple games.) to keep installation size down.

Config.Name: Game Path
Config.Description: The location where the Black Ops 2 Multiplayer files are located.

Config.Name: Config File
Config.Description: The configuration file to use for the server.
